recipe_text: Quantity; 900; Prepare 900 grams of frozen tater tots| Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of cooked pork shoulder, shredded| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of BBQ sauce| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of green onions, chopped| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of sour cream| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 220 degrees C (425 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Spread frozen tater tots in a single layer on a baking sheet| Timed; 1200; Bake tater tots in the preheated oven for 20 minutes| Untimed; None; In a bowl, mix shredded pork shoulder with BBQ sauce| Untimed; None; Remove tater tots from the oven and top with BBQ pork mixture| Untimed; None; Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the top| Timed; 600; Return to the oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes| Untimed; None; Garnish with green onions and dollops of sour cream| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Memphis BBQ Pork Totchos
